attributes.title: Dysfunctional

attributes.title: This is an abomination
attributes.review: I opened the app and found out it had a picture of a pooping Cheeto!🤢🤮. It then wanted to know if I would marry Trump!  Disgusting!  Never get this crap house of an app or Trump will delete tiktok

attributes.title: worst app ever created
attributes.review: this app is the worst 🤢 when i first opened it it had shown me a video of a donkey giving birth, i am horrified . i now go to theary ten times a week trying to get rid of the horrible memory stuck in my brain. i encourage all that have thought or thinks about using this app to reconsider if they don’t want to have donkey trauma.

attributes.title: Worst App !😑😡
attributes.review: This is not worth your space! I found a pig in the app!! It was slotted! This is app will confused u! These things will lie to you! With all of these reviews, it’s shows that it’s a one star app!!!

attributes.title: Just had to say it

attributes.title: This app is disgusting
attributes.review: This app is horrible! not only did i see a rat dancing on the home page but there were lots of disturbing images.

attributes.title: Why?
attributes.review: This app is so stupid. I open the app expecting to see my president but I only saw pictures of a clown wearing too much bronzer? I thought this app was for our president. Smh
